meanings.definition: Free of deceit or untruthfulness; sincere.
meanings.sent1: She always tells the honest truth.
meanings.sent2: It's important to be honest with your friends.
meanings.sent3: The honest rabbit admitted to eating all the carrots.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as honest as a clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The honest smile on his face reassured everyone.

meanings.definition: Fair and straightforward in conduct; morally upright.
meanings.sent1: He made an honest decision based on what was right.
meanings.sent2: Being honest in your actions builds trust.
meanings.sent3: The honest judge always listened to both sides.
meanings.sent4: Her honest heart guided her to help those in need.
meanings.sent5: The honest handshake sealed the deal.

meanings.sent1: An honest person keeps their promises.
meanings.sent2: You can always rely on an honest friend.
meanings.sent3: The honest mechanic fixed the car without overcharging.
meanings.sent4: The honest oak tree stood tall and strong in the forest.
meanings.sent5: His honest character shone through in every action.
